RESTful API Architecture - Resources

Iâ€™m writing this article because when I started to look into this area I searched a lot after the best information that can help me to achieve a high level to design the best RESTful API architecture. Here you can find a list of resources which describes from the basic to the highest level.

Best practice to develop an API

  • https://www.vinaysahni.com/best-practices-for-a-pragmatic-restful-api
  • https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/best-practices/api-design

  • https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec9.html#sec9.5
  • https://medium.com/tech-tajawal/modern-backend-developer-in-2018-6b3f7b5f8b9

  • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_state_transfer
  • https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/best-practices/api-implementation
  • https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html
  • http://www.ics.uci.edu/~fielding/pubs/dissertation/top.htm

  • https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/ETag
